logs.label: Automod Logs
logs.description: Where automoderation logs will be sent to

malicious_urls.label: Block Malicious URLs
malicious_urls.description: Filters out known malicious URLs from a public database

api_keys.label: Block API Keys
api_keys.description: Blocks Detected API keys leaked in messages

spam.label: Spam
spam.description: How many messages must be sent within 3 seconds of each other to trigger the spam filter

toxicity.label: Toxicity Filter
toxicity.description: How certain the bot must be of a toxicity detection to act on it

hate-speech.label: Hate-speech Filter
hate-speech.description: How certain the bot must be of a hate-speech detection to act on it

nsfw.label: NSFW Filter
nsfw.description: How certain the bot must be of a NSFW detection to act on it

blacklist.label: Word Blacklist
blacklist.description: Blacklist words in messages, automatically detects potential variants of listed words

default_profanities.label: Default Profanity Lists
default_profanities.description: Which languages to apply a default profanity list for if detected in a message

untrusted_block_attachments.label: Untrusted Block Attachments
untrusted_block_attachments.description: What types of attachments the bot should block from users you consider untrusted.
